instructions.innocent: You are innocent. You have no abilities at night. You simply participate in the discussion and vote.
instructions.mafia: You are in the mafia. You can send a message to mafia members at night with %mafia speak <message>. You can vote for who to kill with %mafia vote <name>.
instructions.detective: You are a detective. You can discover the character of another player once per night with %investigate <player>.
instructions.doctor: You are the doctor. You can save any player from being killed once per night with %save <name>.
